channel.title: FFA (Free For All) dicing battles! "Dyce it All"
channel.description:
Hey, this is for Dyce It All! I'm going to host a bunch of FFA battles, assuming I can get enough people to join. :P
If you are familiar with dice dueling, FFA is similar. There is a wager, just like in a duel, except there are more than two people involved. The host keeps tabs on 3 or more people, all whom put the same amount of money in. They all roll at the same time, and the highest wins. If the highest ties, only the tiers reroll until there is one winner. The winner takes 90% of the pot (10% goes to the host).
Here's an example: a 500k 5-person FFA would have a 2.5m pot, and the winner would take 2.25m (90% of the total), which is a 450% profit.
I'm not going to limit the number of people that can join, I'm simply going to have 3 categories based on amounts. Eventually, I'll name a time (they will always be held in world 3), and then everyone can go to the area and join for the battle.
I'm adding my own twist to traditional FFA, however. You can place one bet per roll you want in the duel. For example, if you pay 1.5m in a 500k FFA, after everyone rolls you will be given the choice of rolling two more times (for a total of 3 times, which is 3 times the wager of 500k--1.5m, how much you put in). It's a way of gaining an advantage beyond your peers. So here are the categories! (please list your RSNs for me to add)
500k wager [b](pot: 3.0m)[/b]
[ul][li]6LG[/li] [li]Cole Conduit[/li] [li]r4y2a0n[/li] [li]r4y2a0n[/li] [li]kracky[/li] [li]"casey"[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
1m wager [b](pot: 3.0m)[/b]
[ul][li]r4y2a0n[/li] [li]kracky[/li] [li]"casey"[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
5m wager [b](pot: 5.0m)[/b]
[ul][li]"casey"[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
Remember, you must join the "Dyce It All" friends chat in order to participate. Happy gambling. :)

item.title: FFA (Free For All) dicing battles! "Dyce it All"
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:18, topic:411678”]FFA’s work fine with two six-sided.

It’s literally highest roll wins. If two people tie at low numbers, it doesn’t matter. Highest still wins.

Anyways, just message me on IRC. I don’t want to give me RSN out.[/quote]
you have before I found it in 10 minutes on another site.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

FFA’s work fine with two six-sided.

It’s literally highest roll wins. If two people tie at low numbers, it doesn’t matter. Highest still wins.

Anyways, just message me on IRC. I don’t want to give me RSN out.

item.title: FFA (Free For All) dicing battles! "Dyce it All"
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Use the percentile dice, as the two six sided ones do not work well with this concept.

I’ll have to think about that. There are a lot of ties with the 2 six-sided dice, but that’s because the odds are much better than with the percentile dice. I think I prefer the 2 six-sided just to keep chance as high as it can be for everyone.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

reyx7:

I don’t believe this deserves a separate post, as it is linked to “dyce it all” which already has a topic.

The dyce it all post is about the clan, this is about an event. Separate purposes, separate posts.

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:2, topic:411678”]I’ll join the 500k wager. RSN: 6LG

Any idea when this will be?[/quote]

Probably within a week or two, depending on how long it takes to get enough members to make it worthwhile. Glad you could join.
